text: what's up outliers quick video outlining the week ahead what we have coming down the pike and this past week was a general massive rally across all the indices we saw in spy Q's iwm so I just want to talk really quick about essentially what this week looks like coming up and then I want to take a look at GameStop in the repositioning following the recent options expiration and just some general thoughts behind that so in my opinion you can tell when we look at spy Q's iwm is the only exception to this rule right now where both of these other indices are kind of starting to roll over a little bit not in terms of rolling down but in terms of consolidation these aren't the same parabolic up phases that you see here it's started in spy kind of starting to Trend sideways and it's been sideways again in qes for a little bit iwm caught a breath of fresh air when the um fomc committee and their J Pal's Retreat right now to Jackson Hole they're talking about essentially cutting rates so the markets RIT larged really like that volatility is down again yet again it essentially hit a high of last week we were up to 1806 and then it closed down at 1586 so V got pretty meaningfully suppressed by that so when I look at the week ahead in this context I'm looking for two things I'm looking for are we

text: the first thing I'm really eager to experience through earnings which is again right now supposed to be on the 4th before the market of September now the second thing is I still think this volatility needs to come up it's already come up a little bit it's now at 78 but it still is utterly shocking to me that the expiration cycle that includes earnings here is at 78 1.5 and then the following expiration cycle which is ALS this is nothing this is just another weekly expiration cycle is all the way up at 95 that's also very interesting to me there's part of me that thinks maybe they think that the earnings release might shift out again I that is pure tin foil because I have no idea why that would happen other than the fact that I just see a lot of volatility in another weekly expiration without something I can I positively identify why it would be the case typically if I was looking at an options chain and I see this kind of Vault here my assumption is actually that earnings would be here not here so have to see where we go from there but as always I'm really stoked for the week ahead there's a lot a lot of opportunity out there in the market right now and I'm going keep looking at GameStop as you know for everybody that's interested the live stream sessions for this week will be posted on
